website_summaries.verdict: A premium portable changing pad that will maintain its appearance for years to come.
pros: Offers a convenient front zipper pocket for keys, a phone, and other items
Boasts a mesh pocket that holds up to four large diapers, creams, and various diaper-changing essentials
Comes with a strap with clip so you can hang the pad on to your stroller or wrist
cons: Wipes container does not always close properly

customer_reviews.title: Goes well with Skip Hop forma diaper bag.
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been the last 2 babies! You get what you pay for with skip hop. All their diaper products are sturdy and high quality. This is no different. You can detatch the pad and not take zippered pouch with you or the whole thing can be a mini diaper bag in a pinch during a quick outing or errand. Matches my diaper bad accessories that already came with my diaper bag from skip hop. Mine was turquoise. gp/aw/d/B00R4PXJG6/ref=mp_s_a_1_5?ie=UTF8&qid=1515120491&sr=8-5&pi=AC_SX236_SY340_FMwebp_QL65&keywords=skip+hop+forma+diaper+bag&dpPl=1&dpID=41mnLcFsgcL&ref=plSrch
customer_reviews.author: Domestic_Diva23

customer_reviews.title: I used to carry a diaper, bad of wipes, & changing pad in my purse!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my first baby eight years ago and I remembered how it made trips so much easier with a toddler who doesn't necessarily need a whole diaper lugged around for a simple trip to the park, mall, or grocery store. The changing pad material is easy to clean/wipe. Pocket on the inside with refillable wipe case, mesh pocket inside for creams or hand sanitizer, and pocket on the outside could fit something small. Small clip on the side to clip in to stroller
customer_reviews.author: mariella

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it in the mail, haven’t used it yet so I can’t comment on the functionality completely but holy moly I LOVE IT! I was worried it would be too bulky but it’s not, it’s perfectly sized. And I especially love how there is a zippered section where you can remove the extra storage part- which I didn’t realize was detachable when I bought and I LOVE that because I know sometimes I’ll just want the changing pad alone without the extra part. My only regret is not buying this for baby #1 because I would have LOVED it. I know it’ll get a lot of good use for #2.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra

customer_reviews.title: Quality ok, size and design not useful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our first child. Realized afterward that it was impractical. It doesn’t fit many diapers or wipes and we ended up just using a diaper bag when going out. I guess it’s ok if you’re just going out for a quick trip- but we still just use the diaper bag. Quality of product is fine- just the concept and size are not useful.
customer_reviews.author: Braden E Yandle

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter in law before my grandson was born. She has used it so much. It is great to bring to my house for changing diapers. It keeps things cleaner, and it something gets on it, you can clean it off very easily and sanitize it. It has been great for travel too. You can lay it out in the back seat of a vehicle to change a diaper, and know that it will protect your car seat from getting soiled. You can get a lot of use out of this, and I would recommend it to anyone who is expecting a baby.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This item is a must have IMO. It's perfect for those short trips where you don't need to lug around a large diaper bag with everything your baby could possibly need. It holds a good amount of wipes, a few diapers, a spare outfit, and a small tube of diaper cream (think the travel size you probably have tons of anyway). It can clip onto a stroller and easily fit under one. The changing pad is a good size as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great changing station
customer_reviews.text: Great changing station! I love this Skip Hop Pronto Changing Station! It is very easy to grab and go! I can attach this to the stroller and I can even attach it to my baby carrier so I don't have to worry about the bulky diaper bag. I like how I can just bring it into the bathroom and use one hand to open up everything within the bag. The changing pad is a good size and I have enough room for diapers and personal items, such as chapstick, keys and my phone. I recommend this changing station to all the mommy's!
customer_reviews.author: Frost Fam

customer_reviews.title: Compact and helpful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this from a friend's registry as a baby shower gift. I got to watch the baby everyday for a few weeks and used this multiple times a day. It's LIGHTWEIGHT, feels COMFORTABLE, wipes CLEAN, COMPACT when folded. The flap that folds down for the baby to lay down on is a good length for young babies, but I don't think it will work very well when they get taller. I can't say it's worth $30 though, I think $20 is the right price point for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bri J

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome purchase. I recommend to every momma. It's perfect for on the go. I use it in our car, diaper bag, & my husband can grab it & go with baby without a diaper bag. This EXACT same product is on Buy Buy Baby website for $29.99, and I found it here on amazon for waaaay cheaper. It's easy to clean & surprisingly it fits alot. I currently carry 4 diapers, wipes, a change of clothes (socks included) & diaper rash cream. And it all fits perfectly. LOVE this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly practical, turns any bag into a diaper bag.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I wanted a new one for our new baby. Plus the first one was growing mold. But, it's incredibly practical and can turn any bag or backpack into a diaper bag. It can also be clipped to a stroller. This is a definite must have for any family with a baby. Besides growing some mold, the older one which is now over 3 years has held up perfectly. Entire bag is in tact with very little wear showing.
customer_reviews.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like it because it doesn't hold almost any diapers ( maybe 2-3 ) and it's too full already and feels chunky. Also heard that the red wipes case that comes with it bleeds the red color onto the wipes. Also barely fits any wipes... I'm returning it. So unhappy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: love the changing station
customer_reviews.text: An essential for anyone needing to change diapers! It holds about 6 size 1 diapers, wipes, butt paste, plastic bags for diaper disposal. The part the baby lays on can be easily cleaned, and is a perfect barrier between baby and sometimes sketchy changing surfaces. We use it all the time in the back of our suv for quick changes too. The strap also allows for clipping to the stroller so you don't have to carry it. This is the only thing we take with us when we go out with baby, no heavy diaper bag extras.
customer_reviews.author: MammaDumpling

customer_reviews.title: A great travelling companion
customer_reviews.text: This is a great portable travelling companion and hold enough stuffs that you would need for a few hours trip.This is the second time I ordered it. This time for a friend. She carries it everywhere and loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Swady

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It looks great. measures approximately 38" x 21.5" when open. Good quality, except for the red case which I don't think I'll be using for the intended purpose. Any ways it'ss a good purchase. The fabric looks good, and the plastic where the baby goes is not that hard, and it has a little bit of cushion in it.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed having this product..I actually don't use the pocket part..I just unzipped it and left it at home to collect dust. But the changing pad part I use every day and keep it in my diaper bag so I can change baby in the car, the park or put it down when I have to use a public changing table because they are yucky.
customer_reviews.author: austin w.

customer_reviews.title: Portable changing pad
customer_reviews.text: The only downside to this pad is that the head cushion is pretty much nonexistent. This pad has been a life safer at home and when we are out and about. It is very easy to wipe down and keeps diapers and wipes nearby for easy access while changing. We have found many of the changing stations when you are out are pretty filthy and this pad gives me peace of mind that I don’t have to put our baby on them or spend time cleaning them.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great for newborns
customer_reviews.text: Would highly recommend this. Sturdy, waterproof material, very handy for midnight diaper changes. We keep it in our room near the bassinet for late night changes and then throw it in the diaper bag when we need to leave the house. Large enough pocket to fit several newborn diapers and diaper cream, also comes with a small travel wipe holder.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyB

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this changing pad! I take it alone when I don't need a huge diaper bag, it can clip on to the stroller or I can hold it like a handbag. I hold 3-4 diapers, diaper cream, wipes, a onesie and on the outside zipper; I put a baby food pouch, a teething cracker, a bib, and an extra pacifier. I stuff it and it still fits perfectly in my bag or just carrying it.
customer_reviews.author: SA3

customer_reviews.title: They thought of everything!
customer_reviews.text: This product has three pockets. Two zipper pockets, and one mesh. Perfect for holding diapers, wipes, rash cream etc. it also comes with a wipe storage box that is clear so you can easily check if you need to throw more wipes in the diaper bag. I use this everywhere. It has two handles which come in handy when carrying baby and having to open doors. If I leave the house with nothing else for my son, I bring this.
customer_reviews.author: WhatOK

customer_reviews.title: A MUST have
customer_reviews.text: It may be a little bit expensive but is definitely pay the worth. Sometimes if I'm in a rush or I'm going out with my baby for less than 2 hrs, taking the whole diaper bag with us is just too much. I bought 2 of this: one to leave it at my husband's car, another for me. Is so easy to just grab it and hit the road. Enough space for diapers, wipes, rash cream, a onesie, a bib or washcloth. It also comes with a changing mat perfect to a quick (anywhere) change. Easy to clean too, gorgeous pattern! You just can't go wrong with a gift like this.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Wipes case bleeds red!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this until one day I opened the case to use wipes and they were red from the plastic wipes case. So glad I caught this before using more on my dear baby's bottom! Makes me leery of the actual changing pad now as well.
customer_reviews.author: The C Family

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver for changing diapers on the go!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver for changing diapers on the go! There have been a lot of times when there is no changing table around, and this has everything we need for a diaper change so we can use it anywhere. Even when a changing table is available, they are kind of hard and who knows what has been on them. This pad is soft and I feel a lot better about putting my baby on it, because I know it's clean. The storage compartments are super helpful, and the whole thing folds up to be really compact.
customer_reviews.author: DZ

customer_reviews.title: My “go to” portable baby changer!! 5 *****
customer_reviews.text: Skip hop brand has me sold on their portable baby changing pad product! It’s wide, very well made, room for enough diapers/wipes, cleans well and it’s stylish. :)
customer_reviews.author: Romig

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy wipes case, otherwise great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this changing mat - loads of pockets and quite expandable. However not sure what they were thinking when they included the incredibly flimsy wet wipes case. Fell apart after a week of use. A full size case doesn’t quite fit. So not sure what to do now...
customer_reviews.author: R-W

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few changing pads, unsure which one I would like. I love this one, it's by far my favorite. It's a bit larger than some of the others, so I don't think I would carry this around in my diaper bag, but we are planning on carrying it in the stroller or leaving in the back of a car. It's very nicely made and well worth the money. I also love the detachable changing pad and the fact that the changing pad will allow for easy clean ups.
customer_reviews.author: qbc1899

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for quick diaper changes.
customer_reviews.text: Convenient. Great for doing diaper changes without needing to lug your whole diaper bag with you into the public bathroom (don't expect it to hold a lot). A bunch of people complained about the wipes container and although it's a bit thicker than I'd like, I've had no problem with the container's color bleeding into my wipes. Wipes have stayed wet so far. The matt is a little on the short side though as my baby is 4 months old and ~20th percentile in height but her bottom is already on the verge of hanging over the bottom of the changing pad.
customer_reviews.author: Baby Joy-Rage

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not great
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this portable changing mat, and it's certainly better quality than a couple other mats I've tried. But like the others, the mat part itself is too thin and there's no head pillow for the baby. It's just feels thin and uncomfortable. You also can't really pack more than a few diapers since the unit would fold properly and is too bulky with more than a few diapers, so I still have to carry a diaper bag. Still, I haven't found a better changing mat though, so until I do, this will have to suffice.
customer_reviews.author: Cassian Sheng

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any mam or dad on the go!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! At first I had purchased a bigger diaper bag and was using the small changing pad that came with it. I soon realized that this only helped me if there was an actual changing station, and many restaurants and stores still aren't equipped with baby changing tables. I found this Skip Hop changing pad and ordered it right away! I love that it unfolds to a large size, is very easily cleaned, and holds just the essentials for a diaper change. It's cute so I don't Mind carrying it around and small enough that I can just toss it in a more stylish tote.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Raymond

customer_reviews.title: This is a great travel clutch changing pad
customer_reviews.text: This is a great travel clutch changing pad. Love the storage area as well as how large the changing pad area is. It’s great that everything is all in one place. Also a great option that you can attach the clutch to the stroller and detach the pad from the storage area.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Purchase one for someone expecting a child.
customer_reviews.text: Product had last more than a year which is a testament to its quality. Easy to clean and sanitize after use. Small size allows it to be stored and transported easily. Can attach to stroller via the clip. Whether taking the little one(s) to stay with a friend or family, going to a convention, hiking, or to the park. Slip this into a backpack with some toys and snacks and you will make parenting all the easier.
customer_reviews.author: Randy W

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much, we bought another! Love that it is durable and easy to use. We use it for every change and it’s easy to clean if there is an accident. It has saved our white couches MANY times and it’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Elise Hosseini

customer_reviews.title: Decent Massage Tool
customer_reviews.text: This works great if you have someone to rub your back for you. Only problem is, if you push too hard the ball goes in to the casing too far and it doesn't provide a proper massage.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Dodd

customer_reviews.title: I love the design and concept
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and concept, but if you put more than one diaper in the diaper compartment, it would make this looks so bulky and will not close easily. I would never want to leave with only one diaper on me. also the red box for the wipes is pretty useless. It will just add one extra step when you want to wipe your baby that is not necessary
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_JunkieTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the Pronto Changing Station! I also purchased the matching duo signature diaper bag, and this fits well in the main compartment. I love the fact that I don't have to lug the entire big diaper bag around if I'm going somewhere quick-i can just take the Pronto with me. It's awesome to also always have a changing pad to keep my little one off of surfaces that may not be the cleanest.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on the go!
customer_reviews.text: This product is really nice. I mainly use the changing pad and not the zippered section. I do like that you can remove the zippered section if you want. I also like that the changing pad has a little cushion for the head too.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately not a winner.
customer_reviews.text: Ok so on my quest for the perfect changing pad, I bought this. I bought it because: - It matched the diaper bag I had bought - It was waterproof - It looked compact and comfortable Sadly, it's waterproof on both sides, making it slippery and quite uncomfortable for baby. There's no padding! So if you want to use this on the go, it's kinda tough on baby's skin. It's also not as compact as I had hoped. We never use it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Nary

customer_reviews.title: Easily portable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for “emergency” use for our first grand baby, who is not here yet. But looks perfectly functional and portable.
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: It got here sealed and in perfect condition. Its everything i hoped it would be
customer_reviews.text: So excited for my changing clutch to arrive. It got here sealed and in perfect condition. Its everything i hoped it would be. Love the wipe holder and the wrislet to help with quick changing trips. Sometimes bringing the whole diaper bag is a pain. This changing clutch makes it easy and convenient to change baby
customer_reviews.author: victoria taylor

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and efficient!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Super convenient for diaper changes on the go. We actually keep this downstairs for changing diapers downstairs as his changing table is in his room upstairs. Is much easier than trucking him upstairs just for a diaper change. Its a little cumbersome to get this setup with one hand if you are holding your baby while trying to put this out. But not a big deal. Well made, has lots of storage for wipes and other stuff as needed. The included wipe container is not that great, we purchased a different wipe container to use with this.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Feeken

customer_reviews.title: Love our diaper wallet
customer_reviews.text: We refer to it as the diaper wallet and it goes everywhere the baby goes. It holds everything but a spare out fit. I appreciate the built in changing pad and the mesh pocket to quickly see how many diapers we have left in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I really LOVE my skip hop changing mat! It was exactly what I was looking for and is the right size to put 3 diapers, travel size wipes, 2 bibs and a onesie. Its easy to use and clean. i also like the small pillow that it is fitted on the mat. I highly recommend this to anybody!
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Kim

customer_reviews.title: Cute design
customer_reviews.text: The zipper sometimes gets stuck but besides that it’s a great changing pad! I love it especially because you can buy matching items, such as a cooler/bottle bag!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: So glad I don’t have to lay my baby on those changing stations in toilets. Gives me peace of mind and comfort to bub.
customer_reviews.author: Priyanka Singh

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to change baby on the go.
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper changer. Been through 3 kids, and we never leave home without it. Great for restaurants, friends houses, baseball stadiums... you name it! One of the best baby gifts we ever got. Had another brand of changing mat and never used it because this one was so perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki Weasley

customer_reviews.title: I love this changing station
customer_reviews.text: I love this changing station. It is very portable and convenient. When I am running errands with my daughter during the day, I just take this instead of lugging around a diaper bag. It has a lot of compartments to put 2-3 diapers, wipes, and even your keys/cellphone. I sometimes stuff a change of clothes into one of the compartments if there is enough space. I may be overdoing it with a change of clothes, but the point is, you can fit a few things. The changing pad is detachable so you can just take that to put in your diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: perfect insert into diaper bag so that you can grab ...
customer_reviews.text: perfect insert into diaper bag so that you can grab it out and easily go to change the baby without having to take everything. the clip and flaps can all be opened one handed. the only thing i would change is to make one pocket have a flap to more easily access the wipes. we also attached disposable bags to the strap so that we always have them handy as well.
customer_reviews.author: bemart

customer_reviews.title: Wish I found this sooner!  Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I found this 4 years ago with my first child. It holds everything you need for diaper changes. No more digging through my diaper bag to find diaper, wipes and pad. It has a strap that you can hook on to the stroller for quick grab and go.
customer_reviews.author: Jakell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, clean, and store
customer_reviews.text: Does what is needed. Easy to fold and store. Fits nicely in the diaper bag we have. Haven't had any complaints for the one month old. Must be working for her.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Used it as my "diaper bag" for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Used it as my "diaper bag" for the first 3 mos without the added bulk! Has a spot for all the things you need such as 3 or 4 diapers, extra clothes and can be attached to a stroller or carrier easily!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Must have for parents when traveling with a baby!
customer_reviews.text: Must have for parents when traveling with a baby! This changing pad makes things a lot easier when you’re out and need to change your baby. It’s easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: devin phillips

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I stash this in our larger diaper bag to use the changing pad, but I always keep spares of diapers/wipes in the pockets as it’s super convenient to grab by itself and take a long if I feel I don’t need the entire diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: The perfect size. I didn't bother using the wipes container ...
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size. I didn't bother using the wipes container and just put a regular half full pack of wipes in there (a full one may be too bulky) but it carries everything I need and is easy to clean and fits my diaper bag with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie M

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but short
customer_reviews.text: Compact and practical, though my kiddo outgrew it around 4-5 months (at about 26" long). We still get some use out of it depending on the cleanliness of our changing environment. It is easy to clean and tucks in or hangs from a bag as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Mama must have
customer_reviews.text: I somehow lost my other one like this and was so happy to be able to grab one on amazon. Light, portable and cute! Only issue is as baby gets older (and longer) you have to be careful not to get their hair caught in the velcro on the zippered pouch. Easy to wipe up and go.
customer_reviews.author: Quanny

customer_reviews.title: It's VERY big
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you measure the inside of your diaper bag. It did not fit in my diaper bag and I have a very large one. And the diaper wipe case that is made out of plastic broke the first time I used it. I usually carry a package of diaper wipes, so it didn't really bother me not to have the plastic case because I don't really need it
customer_reviews.author: tk

customer_reviews.title: Love using this at home or on the go!!
customer_reviews.text: With a new baby at home I love having a diaper changing station in every room. This makes diaper changes easy and you can wipe it off when you are done. It folds up really compact to put in your diaper bag when you go places! Nice pockets for diapers and wipes. I got the gray chevron pattern and it's really cute. A must for any mom!!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Skip Hop diaper bag and LOVE it! My son is now 18 months old and I wanted something to carry with just his changing essentials since I don't need to bring the whole diaper bag now. When I found this pattern I fell in love!! The quality is great and fits perfectly into my Skip Hop diaper bag. This will be perfect for our upcoming move to Hawaii and the 8 hour flight.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Cute and performs much better than others!! Pros: -Changing pad zips off to clean -Stitching on changing pad does not cross by baby's bottom, therefore urine doesn't seep through pad. -buckle to attach to diaper bag doesn't cross top, therefore hangs better. Cons: -After placing diapers in clutch the front of clutch gets bulky -wipe holder is made of cheap plastic and doesn't close as well. Wipes will dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Amy brunet

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I got this, returned it when I realized the diaper bag came with a changing pad, and just recently re-purchased it. It's sooooo much nicer and convenient than the tiny changing pad from the bag! Holds a lot and could actually be the only thing you take with you rather than the whole bag!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: great price and exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter gave it as a baby shower gift. The mother-to-be loved it!
customer_reviews.author: renee

customer_reviews.title: Takes up too much space in the diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: This took up SO MUCH (precious) SPACE in my diaper bag. It is a pretty functional product but it just took up way too much space. I ended up buying the Gathre Leather changing mat which rolled up so easily, wipes down easily and took up much less space. You just don't need this product - I thought it'd be easy to grab for changes in public instead of taking the whole diaper bag, but I 100% have to take the diaper bag with me because of blow outs and such and outfit changes.
customer_reviews.author: Shannan Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Great, compact changing system
customer_reviews.text: Amazing changing pad with organized places for wipes and diapers and such. Compact and easy to throw in the car or in the stroller or just when you don't want to bring the whole diaper bag. Also wipes off super easily- easy to clean!!
customer_reviews.author: Dorian Grey

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite baby gift to myself so i got this for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite baby gift to myself so i got this for a friend and hopefully she loves it as much as i do. I use my big diaper bag all the time but this is so nice to just run to the store or a quick trip
customer_reviews.author: Amesome

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Practical, can use it anywhere, fits perfect on the dieper bag, enough space for diepers, dieper ointment, and wipes
customer_reviews.author: Maria Elisa Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever. This gets used daily, it's so much more convenient than a diaper bag and because it is so small, it doesn't accumulate crap like a diaper bag.. We threw out the plastic wipe holder that came with it and just use the package the wipes come in.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Paterson

customer_reviews.title: Makes any bag a diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: I tried a few different diaper carriers before I bought this one. It is fantastic! It's small enough that I can put it in a bag I'm carrying and easily bring it out for diaper changes. The attached changing pad is the smartest way to go. I could not say enough about this. It might be my new go-to shower gift for friends.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Love it for when I'm on the go
customer_reviews.text: Love it for when I'm on the go, i love that you can attach it to a stroller...great for when your at Disneyland and don't want to take your giant diaper bag when all you need is your changing station gear!! I bought two one for on the go (stroller) and another that stays in the car as an emergency diapering station.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and gender neutral
customer_reviews.text: We got this to match our diaper bag and it is great. Overall, changing pads are pretty simple things, just plastic padding. However there are a few things that you should note about this particular product. The pad is large, this is great so when my baby is squirming I don't need to constantly pull her back on the pad. Secondly, it is gender neutral so my hubby can use it and not feel embarrassed pulling out something with flowers. My hubby is great about changing diapers so I feel that getting something he can use as well is a major bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Huang

customer_reviews.title: On the go
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect setup for on the go. I also have on that I keep in the car just in case. Very portable and easy to store. Every mom needs one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She says it’s the perfect size to fit right in her diaper bag and ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift. It is high quality and they still use it. She says it’s the perfect size to fit right in her diaper bag and she loves how easy it is to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Atali Bouck

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great for changing on the go. The little bit of padding for the head works well for my baby. I do wish there was a little more space to put diapers. I can squeeze four in there right now without making it a huge bulge.
customer_reviews.author: Herman

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: I don't leave the house without it. It keeps all the essentials
customer_reviews.author: Anna O

customer_reviews.title: Perfect baby shower gift
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect bag to gift to a new mom or even have for yourself if you have a baby. A changing pad, storage for diapers, and wipes and it is easy to carry. I am very pleased with this portable changing mat.. it is also easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelylady79

customer_reviews.title: We have two, one on each car
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I loved these. We think it's convenient that we have one on each car and every now and then refill them. It works great and we both don't freak out when we rush out because the diapers and wipes are there.
customer_reviews.author: M. Haas

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like the convenience of having a smaller version of a diaper bag. The quality is great and the design is really cute! For such a small pack it offers so many small compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Lilie Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It's of excellent quality and design, and it's really handy. Whenever my son needs a diaper change and we're out and about, it's so much more convenient to just grab this, rather than bringing the entire diaper bag into the bathroom. I love how you can put everything you need to change your baby into one convenient carry-all. My only small criticism is the wipes case that it comes with. I wish it had a separate hole where you can thread the wipe through, so it separates from the other wipes. I would still recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Aproool

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE Skip Hop products
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Skip Hop products, and this was np dofferent. It's so convenient to just grab this and go with a few diapers and wipes instead of always taking a full diaper bag into stores!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Must have for public bathrooms!
customer_reviews.text: Must have when changing baby in public places!! It’s so easy to use I can do it with one hand. One downside is the size of the changer but it’s cute so it’s a good trade off. Has plenty of pockets for diapers and wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is the best thing to have
customer_reviews.text: this is the best thing to have. I just fill it w/ some diapers and wipes. I bring it into the changing room with baby instead of having to bring my gigantic diaper bag. Most convenient thing ever!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Portable changing station
customer_reviews.text: Great for quick trips that don't require a bulky diaper bag. Fits an entire pack of wipes and a handful of diapers. Easy to open and close. Great for diaper changes when out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Vilaysack

customer_reviews.title: Cute, efficient and organized
customer_reviews.text: Cute, efficient and organized. Exactly what you need in a moment when you’re out and need to change the baby, especially when there aren’t proper changing tables. I was using the flimsy mat that cane with my diaper bag at first, but this is so much easier. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BeccaG

customer_reviews.title: So easy - WAY better than lugging around a giant diaper ...
customer_reviews.text: So easy - WAY better than lugging around a giant diaper bag. Perfect for quick outings, appointments, or all day use. I keep one in my car and I got an additional one to keep in my husband's car so we are always prepared. He loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Sara S

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Compact Diapering on the Go
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking, compact (I carry this in my diaper bag 90% of the time), easily cleaned and functional. Has everything you need. I do wish the wipes case had a smaller Kleenex box type opening feature too, but otherwise, a perfect diapering-to-go system.
customer_reviews.author: JQ

customer_reviews.title: A must for parents
customer_reviews.text: Gave this a present and parents said that this is a must for all parents. Take this every where, very easy to clean and storage on purse.
customer_reviews.author: V. Levy

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I can run into a store or restaurant with just enough diapers and wipes for that small trip without a huge diaper bag! It is easy tofold one handed too, so once baby is changed I hold her while I fold up the pad.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Not cool. No I didn't wash it or get it ...
customer_reviews.text: The red tag on the outside bled color onto the chevrons. Not cool. No I didn't wash it or get it wet for any reason.
customer_reviews.author: tabitha j

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Keeps everything ya need to change the granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Keeps everything ya need to change the granddaughter. My daughter has one and I got one also just in case. Both love the ease of carrying this.
customer_reviews.author: Charles P Miller

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE the clutch 'system' for changing diapers
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the clutch 'system' for changing diapers. This product is just bulkier than I anticipated, but the quality and convenence can not be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: You will be happy to have it!
customer_reviews.text: Being a mom means you better be prepared for the unexpected and that's exactly where this little changing pad excels. Very small considering the amount of pockets and functions. Would highly recommend this to friends, family, and anyone who happens to be reading this.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy J.

customer_reviews.title: red skip hop tag
customer_reviews.text: The portable changing station works great, folds easily and the size is perfect. The only thing is the red tag on the front. If it gets damp the color runs.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's a great buy for my kid
customer_reviews.text: It's a great buy for my kid. He's now 6 months old and still we can use it. We travel a lot and this helps me a lot. Only reason I gave 4 star is I find it little bit pricey but good quality so it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have a love hate with this
customer_reviews.text: I have a love hate with this. I love that it is easy to grab and throw in a purse or the car when you don't need the whole diaper bag. But I hate that when it is folded up, the part that was sitting on the public changing table is now facing out and touching the other stuff in my purse. I'm not a germaphobe, but public changing tables can be pretty gross and I don't really want to be touching that all the time. I think that if I had realized that before purchasing, I would have thought twice.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Awesome changing mat! Poorly made plastic wipes holder.
customer_reviews.text: I love this portable changing mat! Has a large surface area for the baby and storage pockets. I wish the plastic wipes holder it came with was better though, it wont stay closed so can dry your wipes out.
customer_reviews.author: Trudyann

customer_reviews.title: Bit bulky but great
customer_reviews.text: This is so handy for at restaurants you can just pick ithe up and everything you need is in there. Kinda bulky in my diaper bag that's the only thing I don't like
customer_reviews.author: High-Klass

customer_reviews.title: My favorite baby purchase
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be one of those things that as a first time mom I bought just because it seemed cool, then would end up being silly. I was so wrong! This has been the handiest thing I've purchased so far! The wipes dispenser sucks though, so I bought a different one to stick inside.
customer_reviews.author: MelodyAnne

customer_reviews.title: Don't question just buy!
customer_reviews.text: Why the hell didn't I buy one of these for my first kid? I love this thing and take it everywhere! No need to carry around a bulky diaper bag to stores/dinner leave that bag in the car for emergencies and bring this in with you for shorter more frequent trips
customer_reviews.author: P.J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my girlfriend’s shower. Was actually in her registry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty good and it gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty good and it gets the job done. I just wish there was a little extra padding/cushion where the head lies. Otherwise, this is a pretty convenient contraption.
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome! the way that the various components fold up ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! the way that the various components fold up into a neat little package is excellent. Highly recommended for a new parent!!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin D.

customer_reviews.title: I like the zip pockets to keep in cloth wipes that ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the zip pockets to keep in cloth wipes that I pack. Lots of Velcro straps to keep things from falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra S.

product_meta.title: Skip Hop Portable Baby Changing Pad: Pronto Wipe Clean Changing Mat with Built-In Pillow and Wipes Dispenser, Chevron
product_meta.description:
Style:Pronto Changing Pad| Color:ChevronThe ultimate diaper changing tool makes baby changing easy-no matter where you are. Our ultra-convenient clutch features a wipe-clean, zip-off changing pad, built-in pillow and translucent wipes case for timely refills. The large mesh pocket holds up to four diapers plus creams and other essentials, while the front zippered pocket is perfect for keys, cell phone or other personal items. Simply drop the Pronto in your bag, strap it to your wrist or clip it to your stroller and go! Front zipper pocket for keys, wallet, phone, and personal items Drop it in any bag, strap it to your wrist or clip it to your stroller Pronto pillow keeps baby's head comfy Mesh pocket holds up to four large diapers, creams and other essentials Translucent wipes case is see-through for timely reloads Two products in one-changing pad zips off of clutch for independent use Extra-wide wipe-clean changing pad Size - Closed (inches): 11.75l x 4w x 8.25h; (cm): 30l x 10w x 21h Size - Changing pad (inches): 23.5l x 21.75w.

BRAND STORY
By Skip Hop
feature_bullets: Ultimate baby changing station makes baby diaper changes easy-no matter where you are. Pronto pillow keeps baby's head comfy
Our ultra-convenient travel changing pad clutch features a wipe-clean, zip-off changing pad, built-in pillow and translucent wipes case for timely refills.
The large mesh pocket of the baby changing station holds up to four diapers plus creams and other essentials, while the front zippered pocket is perfect for keys, cell phone or other personal items.
Simply drop the Pronto portable changing pad in your bag, strap it to your wrist or clip it to your stroller and go
